author: ianna
body:
#### PR description:

* Add DDDWorld test
* Add G4 regions description test
* Remove Geometry producer plugin
* Move tests to a test/plugin directory
* Add script to run the tests automatically

#### PR validation:

```scram b runtests```

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

no back port is needed
title: SimG4: DD4hep Geometry Tests
